com.mapdigit.gis.navigation

Interface IVoiceCommandListener


  • public interface IVoiceCommandListener
    voice command listener.

    © Copyright 2009 Guidebee Pty Ltd.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void voiceCommandAction(VoiceCommandArg[] args, boolean optional)
      Indicates that a voice command event has occurred.

    • Method Detail

      • voiceCommandAction

        void voiceCommandAction(VoiceCommandArg[] args,
                      boolean optional)
        Indicates that a voice command event has occurred.
        Parameters:
        args - voice command args. normally the args has 3 members as follows DISTANCE_XXX current road name TURN next road name. NEXT TURN next road name.
        optional - is the voice command optional or not.
